application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to condition 4 (materials/works record) of Listed Building Consent Ref: 5971/APP/2013/1839, dated 31-05-2017 (Dismantling of existing farm outbuilding and reconstruction to accord with planning application ref: 5971/APP/2016/3922 (Rebuilding of existing barn with internal and external alterations to create two three-bedroom dwellings with associated parking and landscaping) (Application for Listed Building Consent)
decision_conditions: The details submitted in relation to discharge of Condition 4 (materials/works record) do not contain information to adequately address the wording of the condition and therefore insufficient information has been provided to discharge the condition. Details of the following are required to discharge the condition:
a) New frame elements, including roof construction
b) Full constructional details and methodology for reconstruction, including details of floor levels and fixing of new to old fabric
f) Type, finish and location of flues, vents and SVPs
g) All new roof lights, windows and external doors (to include materials, design and construction)
i) Works to repair and reconstruct the granary
The submitted details therefore fail to comply with Policies DMHB 1 and DMHB 2 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (January 2020).
The applicant is advised that the photographs submitted with the application indicate the constructed barn has not been built in accordance to approved plans.
Please note that no conditions have been approved/discharged under this planning submission.
